item.title: PS5 Pro Packaging Has Interesting Spin on Console's Lack of a Disc Drive
item.description:
Key Takeaways

  • The PS5 Pro's lack of a disc drive is highlighted on its packaging, upsetting some gamers.
  • Sony's choice to go disc-less with the PS5 Pro raises concerns about ownership of digital content.
  • Despite its high $700 price tag, the PS5 Pro is leading Amazon's console sales.

The PlayStation 5 Pro is almost here, and its box suggests that the console's notable lack of a disc drive is a selling point. While the original PS5 came in two editions, one with a disc drive and one without, its newest iteration is purely digital. Players have known this since Sony announced the release, but the official packaging of the PlayStation Pro 5 has caught the ire of some gamers by listing its disc-free nature as a feature.

Some have already speculated that the PS5 Pro could mark the end of physical games, as it's the first flagship console from Sony or Microsoft not to have a disc-supporting version. That speculation sparked a good deal of controversy among fans. Now that the PS5's official box art is out in the open, its proud proclamation of being disc-less may feel like rubbing salt in the wound.

Even though the PS5 Pro won't be released until November 7, some reviewers and retailers have already gotten their hands on the console. The official PlayStation store listing for the console also reveals its packaging, which features the words "DISC-FREE Console" in the upper-right corner. Considering this appears right next to the logos for its 4K and HDR specs, it seems like Sony is telling buyers that the lack of physical media is actually an advantage. Of course, the text and little disc logo could also be the company trying to maintain transparency with users, but it doesn't necessarily come across that way.

The Pros and Cons of a Disc-Free PlayStation 5 Pro

While it may anger some players, there are some benefits to removing the disc drive. The PS5 Pro delivers some impressive performance, requiring additional space within the console for next-gen components and heatsinks to keep them cool. It also keeps the form factor slightly slimmer, making it easier to place the way users want to. There's also noise to consider. Discs are inherently loud, so pushing gamers toward digital options instead can improve the overall experience.

At the same time, going disc-free raises some questions about ownership. As Target and other retailers stop selling physical media, some people worry that they won't truly own their games, movies, and music anymore. Players can lose access to digital games if there's an issue with the account they bought or use it with. A physical disc doesn't grant someone ownership of the IP, but it does grant some security because Sony is unlikely to knock on the door demanding a Blu-ray back for a supposed violation of a user agreement.

PlayStation fans can buy a disc drive to add to their PS5 Pro, but an additional $80 on top of a $700 console may rub some people the wrong way. Still, that hasn't stopped the PS5 Pro from becoming the bestselling console on Amazon leading up to its release.

item.title: New Horror Game Hides Clever Silent Hill Easter Egg
item.description:
This article has SPOILERS for Fear the Spotlight

The recently-released survival-horror game Fear the Spotlight includes a surprise nod to Konami's beloved Silent Hill franchise. Fear the Spotlight was technically first released in 2023, but then the game received backing from Blumhouse Games and was pulled from sale. A new and improved version of Fear the Spotlight was then launched in October of 2024. Spoilers for Fear the Spotlight follow .

The new version of Fear the Spotlight gives players a brand-new scenario to complete where they play as Amy. Amy's story features new locations to explore and puzzles to solve, not to mention fleshes out the backstory and helps Fear the Spotlight feel like a much more complete experience. Those that play through both stories in Fear the Spotlight and reach the end of the game will be treated to a neat nod to the Silent Hill franchise.

At the very end of Fear Spotlight , players can read an online newspaper article by Sunnyside Post . The article explains what happened in the aftermath of Fear the Spotlight 's story, and is set up like an actual webpage, complete with ads and links to other articles. In the bottom right-hand corner of the screen, players can see a link for a news article with the headline "Mysterious Fog Hits Toluca Lake," complete with a sign that looks identical to the "Welcome to Silent Hill" sign from the Silent Hill games.

Fear the Spotlight Silent Hill Easter Egg

Survival-horror fans will no doubt recognize Toluca Lake as the lake featured in multiple Silent Hill games. It's adjacent to the titular town and is an important location that players visit on more than one occasion. In fact, Silent Hill 2 famously begins with protagonist James Sunderland looking out over Toluca Lake before venturing into the nightmare that awaits him in the town itself. The headline also references the strange fog that covers Silent Hill and the surrounding areas, tied to the bizarre supernatural occurrences that happen to people unlucky enough to find themselves in the town.

It will be interesting to see if Toluca Lake pops up in future Silent Hill projects. Konami has a number of other new Silent Hill games in active development at various studios, and Silent Hill 2 remake developer Bloober Team has expressed interest in tackling other games in the series as well. It's safe to say that many fans would jump at the chance to revisit the classic Silent Hill games, so hopefully, we get some announcements on that front sooner rather than later.

item.title: Monopoly GO: Free Dice Roll Links (Updated Daily)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Free Monopoly GO Dice Links For Today
  • Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links
  • How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO
  • How To Get Free Dice Rolls In Monopoly Go

Monopoly GO is a fun board game that combines the classic Monopoly experience with cool additional features and a city-building element. In the game, players can move their pieces to earn money and then use that money to build new buildings, upgrade their houses, and much more. The ultimate goal is to drive other players into bankruptcy by acquiring all pieces of property, essentially creating a “monopoly.”

In Monopoly GO , players move according to the roll of dice they get, and the game proceeds with renting, trading, and buying properties. If players have finished their dice rolls and want to get some more, here’s how they can do it.

Updated by Umama Ali on Nov 01, 2024: Without dice, you can’t roll around the board, build landmarks, or participate in any tournaments. Running out of dice can slow down your progress in Monopoly GO, leaving you at a disadvantage compared to other players. With the launch of the Haunted Treasures event, players are looking for more dice to clear milestones and earn rewards. We’ve updated this guide with a bunch of new links that offer free dice roll links so that you can keep building in Monopoly GO. Check back regularly to find new Monopoly GO links.

We discovered only two new dice links on November 01. You can find all the active Monopoly GO dice links in the table below.

Free Monopoly GO Dice Links For Today

While your dice rolls slowly replenish over time, you can use Dice Links to get free dice rolls instantly. Dice Links are a quick and easy way to grab free dice and keep the action going in Monopoly GO .

Here are all the active Monopoly GO Dice Links for November 2024 to help you participate in ongoing events and tournaments and complete boards easily.

Monopoly GO Dice Links

Date

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 31–Nov 04

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 29–Nov 01

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 31–Nov 03

25 x Dice Rolls

Oct 30–Nov 02

Dice links can only be redeemed once per account . Additionally, links expire after a certain amount of time. If you click a link, and it says "This reward cannot be claimed", then that particular link is no longer valid.

Expired Monopoly GO Dice Links

  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls
  • 25 x Dice Rolls

How to Redeem Dice Links in Monopoly GO

To redeem these links, tycoons can follow these simple steps:

  • Open a link on your phone. This will launch the Monopoly GO app on your device.
  • All you need to do then is click 'Collect,' and you'll get dice rolls for free.

How To Get Free Dice Rolls In Monopoly Go

Login Daily

Like most mobile games nowadays, Monopoly GO also offers incentives for players so that they frequently play the game. One of the daily treats is free dice rolls, so logging in daily is one way to get them. In addition to dice rolls, players have the chance to win other exciting prizes as well.

Invite Friends

Monopoly GO offers generous rewards for players who successfully invite others to join the game. If a player invites a friend, and the invited friend joins the game, both of them get 30 extra rolls . Players can keep getting 30 free rolls for inviting up to 30 friends , given that they accept the invitation.

Collect Community Chest Rewards

Community chests are great because they offer a variety of rewards. Players can open these chests to earn money, and if they help a friend with a community chest, they can earn some free rolls.

To make the most out of the community chest, players must ensure that they have at least 9 active in-game friends.

Complete Sticker Albums

Players collect stickers throughout Monopoly GO , and they aren’t just a fun part of the game; they can help players get dice rolls , too. For every sticker set or album that players complete, they receive dice rolls. While the free rolls earned through sticker albums are more than those obtained after completing a set, the process of completing an album can be more time-consuming.

Participate in Events and Tournaments

If you want a bunch of dice rolls, consider participating in events and tournaments. The game introduces new events regularly, and by completing their milestones, you can claim dice rolls, different sticker packs, in-game money, and various other exciting prizes . Tournaments also pack a lot of stellar rewards, so players should aim to secure a high position on the tournament leaderboard to make the most of them.

Special Events

Apart from the main events and tournaments, Monopoly GO also has a number of special events. From Free Parking to Wheel Boost, the game offers many events to help you grab some dice rolls. However, their timings change every day, so you can check out our daily events schedule guide to know when they happen.

item.title: Roblox: Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs List (November 2024)
item.description:
Combat Warriors is similar to many other Roblox shooters, but it is especially addictive and fun because of its fast pace. In fact, someone dies here almost every second, so the developers decided to add kill sounds to diversify the gameplay. Roblox players interested in a complete list of Combat Warriors kill sound IDs can find it below.

Updated November 1, 2024, by Artur Novichenko: Fresh codes are now available, and we’ve got them listed here. Redeem them and enjoy the new kill sounds.

All Combat Warriors Kill Sound IDs (Combat Warriors Codes)

The developers are eager to support this project and add various maps and new features, including more Kill Sound IDs. How to Redeem Kill Shound IDs in Combat Warriors

Redemption of Kill Sound IDs in Combat Warriors is a very simple task. However, if players are still having problems, this step-by-step guide should help to solve them. They should keep in mind though that to unlock the ability to redeem a Kill Sound ID, players will need to pay 199 Robux.

  • Open Roblox and launch Combat Warriors.
  • In the main menu of the game, find the settings.
  • Click on it.
  • Go to the "Audio" tab.
  • Enter the above IDs in the "Kill Sound ID" field.

Combat Warriors Tips and Tricks

To begin with, players need to learn how to move correctly, slide, dash, stomp, and so on, which will lead to success. The next step is to master the combat mechanics. It's not that difficult. Players just need to hit the enemy at the right moment. Completing daily quests is also a key to success, as these quests offer in-game currency with which players can buy new weapons.

Best Roblox Fighting Games Like Combat Warriors

One of the best things about Roblox is the huge variety of games on offer. This bodes well for those who are starting to get bored of their favorite Roblox games, as there are usually plenty of great alternatives just waiting to be discovered. Below, players can learn about the five best Roblox games like Combat Warriors :

  • Project Slayers
  • A One Piece Game
  • Arsenal
  • Dragon Blox
  • Base Battles

About the Combat Warriors Developers

The developers of Combat Warriors never released any other games. But, their group in Roblox already has more than 900K members, and this only indicates the good quality of the project and the hard work of the developers.

item.title: Black Ops 6 Zombies: How to Get GobbleGums
item.description:
Quick Links

  • How to Get GobbleGums in BO6 Zombies
    • Play the Game for Random GobbleGum Rewards
    • Unlock GobbleGums via Level Unlocks
    • Prestige to Get More GobbleGums
    • Exfil After Round 15 to Earn Whimsical Gums
    • Purchase GobbleGums via Microtransaction
  • List of All GobbleGums in Black Ops 6 Zombies
  • How GobbleGums Are Different in Black Ops 6 Zombies

Filled with nostalgia, GobbleGums return in Black Ops 6 Zombies, but the grind to obtain them is more complicated than ever. Initially, developers claimed you could earn all GobbleGums by playing Zombies like free-to-play items. Later, they announced that GobbleGums would also be available in the Store. Also, the devs have not specified how “playing” the game will earn you gums.

To help clarify this, we've created a complete and simplified guide to Black Ops 6 ’s revamped GobbleGums. By the end of this guide, you’ll know various methods to earn gums, as well as understand their rarities and functions like a pro.

How to Get GobbleGums in BO6 Zombies

In Zombies mode, you can unlock and earn GobbleGums through five methods: playing the game, leveling up, reaching higher Prestige levels, Exfiltrating on higher rounds, and purchasing GobbleGums from the store after Season One’s launch.

Play the Game for Random GobbleGum Rewards

In the official blog post introducing Zombies mode, developers stated that you can earn GobbleGums randomly by clearing enemy waves. There’s no specific formula for earning them, as the rewards are primarily based on RNG. Most of the time, you’ll receive the lowest-rarity GobbleGums, though.

Unlock GobbleGums via Level Unlocks

The most reliable way to unlock more GobbleGums is by leveling up. In the Progression section of the Barracks tab, you can check which gums will be granted at each level.

GobbleGum

Unlock Level

Kill Joy

5

Stock Option

8

Who's Keeping Score?

11

Cache Back

15

Anywhere But Here

21

Exit Strategy

23

Soda Fountain

26

Profit Sharing

29

Wall to Wall Clearance

32

Free Fire

36

On The House

38

Nowhere But Here

42

Idle Eyes

45

Wonderbar!

51

Hidden Power

54

Prestige to Get More GobbleGums

At level 20 of each Prestige, you receive a pack of three to five GobbleGums, with higher Prestige levels granting better ones. However, don’t expect more than a couple of Ultra (rarest) gum from these rewards, even at the highest levels.

Exfil After Round 15 to Earn Whimsical Gums

According to Treyarch’s Twitter post, successfully Exfiltrating from any Zombies map after round 15 gives you a chance to earn one to three Whimsical GobbleGums. These gums have playful effects that may not impact gameplay or stats but can spice up your experience.

Purchase GobbleGums via Microtransaction

Although GobbleGums were initially introduced as free-to-play items, they were later confirmed to be available in the in-game Store. So, one sure way to acquire them is through microtransactions. However, note that BO6 ’s store isn’t accessible yet, and you’ll need to wait until the game’s first season launches.

How GobbleGums Are Different in Black Ops 6 Zombies

GobbleGums, first introduced in Black Ops 3 , return in Black Ops 6 with adjusted mechanics to better fit the Zombies mode. Here’s what’s changed.

  • Cooldown Timer : Instead of paying credits to get GobbleGums from the vending machines, which increased in cost each round , Black Ops 6 allows you to obtain them for free with a five-minute cooldown. This cooldown is machine-exclusive and resets at the start of each round.
  • Multiple GobbleGums : Previously, you could only store one GobbleGum at a time. In Black Ops 6 , you can hold up to three and activate them simultaneously.
  • No Crafting : In Black Ops 3 , you could craft high-rarity GobbleGums by spending Liquid Divinium at Doctor Monty’s Factory. In Black Ops 6 , crafting is not possible, and GobbleGums can only be unlocked through gameplay progression or microtransactions.
